channel.title: The Friend Zone
channel.description:
Listen along every Wednesday as Dustin Ross, HeyFranHey & Assante explore mental health, mental wealth and mental hygiene, because who in the hell wants a musty brain?
Send inquiries and questions to:
TheFriendZone@loudspeakersnetwork.com
#TheFriendZone

item.title: Permission Slips - Featuring Maryam Hasnaa
item.itunes:author: Loud Speakers Network
item.itunes:summary:
This week on #TheFriendZone, we’re joined by longtime friend of the show, writer, Seer and Spiritual Practitioner, Maryam Hasnaa. We talk remembering to dream, designing new models of success within and outside of the system, and understanding our relationship to external validation.
Important Maryam Hasnaa Links:
* Our Ways of Knowing: An Exploration of the Intuitive Self Course launches October 5th, 2022 and is a 6 week self paced course that will remain open for enrollment: https://www.maryamhasnaa.com/course-offerings
* Embodiment boxes are available on our Resonance Apothecary site: https://resonanceapothecary.com/products/embodiment-box
* We offer a variety of memberships to our New Earth Mystery School: https://www.maryamhasnaa.com/new-earth-mystery-school
* In celebration of NEMS 5 year anniversary we have a 20% discount code from classes, class sets, Embodying Liberation Course, and Energy is Currency Course. (Code: 5YROFNEMS) this expires 10/01/22
* We have a free Intuition: Back to Basics class via zoom this Sunday, October 2nd. All who feel aligned are welcomed to join using the public registration link: us02web.zoom.us/webinar/register/…Pi0Sa-CQ5SXo3h0ww
Black Business of the Week - https://hazelthebeautyrn.com
Thank you to our Sponsors:
PushBlack - If you want to take control of your finances and begin building wealth, tune into Building Black Dollars by PushBlack. Catch it anywhere you listen to podcasts.
ZocDoc - Go to Zocdoc.com/FRIENDZONE and download the Zocdoc app for FREE. Then start your search for a top-rated doctor today. Many are available within 24 hours.
Follow us online:
Twitter - www.twitter.com/friendzonepod Facebook - www.facebook.com/thefriendzonepodcast Patreon - www.patreon.com/thefriendzonepodcast Discord - discord.gg/Jee2cwfAdz
Have a GREAT day!

item.title: Is An Elephant Heavy?
item.itunes:author: Loud Speakers Network
item.itunes:summary:
This week on #TheFriendZone, we celebrate 7 years and 350 episodes. We reflect on how our show has morphed and grown over the years, favorite guest appearances and our most impactful Hot Button segments. Jessica Jones of Food Heaven stops by the Wellness Segment to talk vitamins and supplements.
Important wellness links: * https://examine.com (research supporting supplements) * https://labdoor.com (checks each supplement in a lab for quality and pureness) * https://www.webmd.com/vitamins-and-supplements/vitamins-minerals-how-much-should-you-take (daily intake and tolerable upper limit) * https://www.hsph.harvard.edu/nutritionsource/anti-nutrients/#:~:text=Phytates%20(phytic%20acid)%20in%20whole,legumes%E2%80%94can%20decrease%20iron%20absorption (absorption inhibitors) * Sea moss- an article vetted by a dietitian that has more info and names the studies https://health.clevelandclinic.org/sea-moss-benefits
Black Business of the Week - nokidsallowed.club
Thank you to our Sponsors: Target - When we invest in ourselves, we’re investing in what’s next for all of us. Stock up on Black-owned brands at Target.
Death of a Salesman - Tickets available now at https://salesmanonbroadway.com
Follow us online: Twitter - www.twitter.com/friendzonepod Facebook - www.facebook.com/thefriendzonepodcast Patreon - www.patreon.com/thefriendzonepodcast Discord - discord.gg/Jee2cwfAdz
Have a GREAT day!

item.title: Chip Pum Pum

item.itunes:summary:
This week on #TheFriendZone, Assanté brings Apple TV’s newest hit show - Severance - to the hot button segment. item.title: Change of Address - A Bonus Episode Sponsored By Target
item.itunes:author: Loud Speakers Network
item.itunes:summary:
This week’s episode of #TheFriendZone is brought to you by Target.
Dustin and Assanté left their homes in their early 20s (Detroit + Atlanta) in pursuit of their dreams. Fran left her home in her late 30s (NYC) in pursuit of peace. We'll share what leaving home is like - from deciding where to go, to what to take and what to leave. Moving trucks. Finding homes in unfamiliar cities and neighborhoods. Finding work. Leaving old friends and loves. Leaving family. Making new friends. And starting life from scratch as an adult in a new city.

item.title: Alma Mater - A Bonus Episode Sponsored By Target
item.itunes:author: Loud Speakers Network
item.itunes:summary:
This week’s episode of #TheFriendZone is brought to you by Target.
We discuss our college experiences; the pressures of standardized testing, college advisors, the application process and college visits. We share the factors that contributed to our final decisions - finances, parents, distance, etc. How it felt adjusting during the first semester. Living with roommates. Working odd jobs to make ends meet. Early morning classes. Managing your social life and grades. And trying to juggle your old life with your newfound life as a college kid.

item.title: The Mobility Myth
item.itunes:author: Loud Speakers Network
item.itunes:summary:
On this week’s episode of #TheFriendZone, we discuss whether or not upward mobility is an illusion. Can you really ever “make it” in a system not designed for you? In a system that rewards your ability to assimilate and comply. Playing the game. Selling out. Respectability politics. Survivor’s Guilt. We share our perspectives and experiences.

item.title: The Paradox of Choice - Featuring Sean Famoso - Co-Founder of LVRN
item.itunes:author: Loud Speakers Network
item.itunes:summary:
On this week’s episode of #TheFriendZone, we’re joined by Sean Famoso, Co-Founder of Atlanta-based Music Label and Artist Management Company - Love Renaissance (LVRN). Home to Summer Walker, Shelley FKA DRAM, 6LACK and DVSN, to name a few. We discuss the process of having a big dream and seeing it through without funding, building a business-model at the intersection of mental health and creativity, learning to work with artists experiencing anxiety and depression, the paradox of choice - and much much more.

item.itunes:summary:
This week on #TheFriendZone, it’s a shoot the shit episode. No hot button. No segments. Brace yourself.
Thank you to our Sponsors: Sanvello - Tis the season to be jolly? …for who exactly? If the “most wonderful time of year” actually feels like the most stressful, Sanvello can help. Sanvello has everything you need to manage stress and feel better, all in one app, including teletherapy, coaching, self-care tools, and a community that gets it. Get free premium and coaching for 2 weeks by visiting https://www.sanvello.com/FRIENDZONE. Sanvello. A place to feel better.
Wondery’s Jacked: The Rise of the New Jack Sound - The New Jack Swing Sound. You know the songs. Bobby Brown’s “My Prerogative,” Bell Biv Devoe’s “Poison,” Blackstreet’s “No Diggity.” It wasn’t just hit songs, it became a movement that took over music, culture, and style. Wondery and Universal Music Group present Jacked: Rise of the New Jack Sound, hosted by Taraji P. Henson. Jacked tells the story of a group of young musicians from Harlem with a dream to change the world. They used their unique talents to create a revolutionary sound in music, New Jack Swing. Go behind the scenes, and into the recording studio with the movement’s most famous artists as they create groundbreaking songs and forever change American culture. Subscribe to Jacked: Rise of the New Jack Sound on Apple Podcasts. Join Wondery plus in the Wondery App to listen, ad free, right now. Wondery - Feel the Story.
Honey - Imagine this: You make a list of the gifts you’re gonna buy for the holidays. And then, someone randomly gives you the money to help buy one. Sound good? Well that’s what Honey is doing - they’re helping pay for ONE MILLION dollars worth of gifts! You’re probably wondering…is this the same Honey that automatically searches for promo codes online? YES, yes it is! With Honey, you can also make a list of all the holiday gifts you want from certain stores, and Honey will email you when the price drops on anything on your list. Just add Honey to your computer, create a free account, and throw some holiday gifts on your Droplist for a chance to win. Honey will randomly select winners and give them the money to help buy something on their list! No purchase necessary. You need a PayPal account to redeem the prize. Only valid in the U.S. Giveaway ends December 21, 2020. Get Honey for free at https://www.joinhoney.com/FRIENDZONE
Native - With the holiday season right around the corner, it’s time to indulge in the sights and sounds and scents of the season. So update your Native collection with their Candy Cane holiday scent, the perfect addition to your daily routine this holiday season. Native deodorants don’t just block odor better, they’re made better, with ingredients you’ve heard of like coconut oil and shea butter. It’s also vegan, and never tested on animals. Native never uses potentially harmful ingredients like aluminum, parabens, sulfates or talc. Their Candy Cane Gift Set makes the perfect gift option, and all Native products are great stocking stuffers for everyone on your list! Native is risk-free to try – every product comes with free shipping within the U.S. PLUS free 30 day returns and exchanges. See why so many people love Native and check out the over 14,000 5-star reviews. Give the gift of Native by going to https://www.nativedeo.com/friend, or use promo code FRIEND at checkout, and get twenty percent off your first order.
Follow us online: Twitter - https://www.twitter.com/friendzonepod Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/thefriendzonepodcast
Have a GREAT day!

item.title: Twenty Twenty
item.itunes:author: Loud Speakers Network
item.itunes:summary:
This week on #TheFriendZone, it’s the Assante Smith takeover. We share our 2020 highs, lows and expectations, with some stories and jokes in between.
Black Business of the Week - https://www.blackfashionfair.org
Wellness Segment - Paradise Resin https://www.etsy.com/listing/519156674/paradise-resin-blend?ref=shop_home_active_47&crt=1
Thank you to our Sponsors: Sanvello - Tis the season to be jolly? …for who exactly? If the “most wonderful time of year” actually feels like the most stressful, Sanvello can help. Sanvello has everything you need to manage stress and feel better, all in one app, including teletherapy, coaching, self-care tools, and a community that gets it. Get free premium and coaching for 2 weeks by visiting https://www.sanvello.com. Sanvello. A place to feel better.
True Botanicals - Given what’s going on in the world, self care is vital. True Botanicals’ products can be calming during these stressful times, and they’re delivered straight to your door. Filled with natural and organic ingredients, True Botanicals skin and body products give you results without toxins so you can feel good while working from home. Every True Botanicals formula is MADE SAFE® certified – so it’s made WITHOUT 5,000+ known toxic ingredients. But unlike most nontoxic products, True Botanicals solutions actually work to REPAIR skin issues. True Botanicals worked with researchers at leading universities including Carnegie Mellon and Cornell to develop potent formulas that work BETTER than leading beauty brands. And in both of their independent clinical studiesTrue Botanicals outperformed Creme de La Mer products. Whether you’re looking for an effective anti-aging regime, seeking a sensitive skin safe solution, struggling with acne-prone skin, or anything else, True Botanicals has a natural formulation that will protect and nourish your skin. You’ve just got to try True Botanicals for yourself. Get FIFTEEN PERCENT OFF your FIRST purchase at https://truebotanicals.com/FRIENDZONE
ShipStation - The holiday season is here and holiday shoppers are buying more stuff online than ever before. If you're an online seller, are you struggling to keep up? Get your SHIP together with ShipStation. ShipStation is the fastest, easiest and most affordable way to manage and ship your orders. In just a few clicks, you're managing orders, printing out discounted shipping labels, and getting your products out fast - resulting in happier holidays for you and your customers. No matter where you’re selling, ShipStation brings all your orders into one simple interface. ShipStation works with all of the major carriers including USPS, FedEx, UPS and even International - they even offer big discounts on shipping costs and you'll always know that you're getting the best deal. No wonder ShipStation is the number one choice of online sellers. And right now, The Friend Zone listeners can try ShipStation FREE for 60 days when you use offer code FRIENDZONE at https://www.shipstation.com
Follow us online: Twitter - https://www.twitter.com/friendzonepod Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/thefriendzonepodcast
Have a GREAT day!

item.title: Deity of Education
item.itunes:author: Loud Speakers Network
item.itunes:summary:
This week on #TheFriendZone, it’s the Dustin Ross takeover. We discuss the relationship dynamics (red flags) witnessed on Tamar Braxton’s latest show, “Get Ya Life”.
Black Business of the Week - Tri-State Podcast Studio https://www.oneofoneproductions.com
Thank you to our Sponsors: Sanvello - Tis the season to be jolly? ...for who exactly? If the “most wonderful time of year” actually feels like the most stressful, Sanvello can help. Sanvello has everything you need to manage stress and feel better, all in one app, including teletherapy, coaching, self-care tools, and a community that gets it. Get free premium and coaching for 2 weeks by visiting https://www.sanvello.com/FRIENDZONE. Sanvello. A place to feel better.
Talkspace - Talkspace is on a mission to make therapy affordable and accessible for all because we all need extra support to feel our best. Talkspace has thousands of licensed therapists trained in over 40 specialities, including anxiety, depression, relationships and more. No matter what, Talkspace will find you the perfect therapist for your goals. Plus, Talkspace is a fraction of the cost of in-person therapy and you can send unlimited messages to your therapist 24/7 and they'll engage daily, five days a week. The bottom line is that we all need someone to talk to. Talkspace wants to give us the support we deserve at a price we can afford. To match with your perfect therapist, go to https://www.talkspace.com or download the app. Make sure to use the code ZONE to get one-hundred dollars off your first month and show your support for the show.
Hello Fresh - HelloFresh, America’s #1 meal kit, lets you skip trips to the grocery store, and makes home cooking easy, fun, AND affordable. HelloFresh offers convenient delivery right to your doorstep for easy home cooking with the family. And you can save 40% by using HelloFresh versus shopping at your local grocery! HelloFresh offers more than 20 chef-crafted, delicious options every week to help you break out of your recipe rut, try new things, and make any night feel special. There’s something everyone will enjoy, including 20 minute meals, low-calorie, vegetarian, family-friendly recipes and more. The packaging HelloFresh uses to ship your food is almost entirely made from recyclable and/or already recycled content, and HelloFresh’s carbon footprint is 25% lower than grocery-made meals. And HelloFresh is committed to donating meals to those in need - so far in 2020, they have donated 3.5 MILLION meals! Go to https://www.hellofresh.com/FRIENDZONE90 and use code FRIENDZONE90 to get $90 off including free shipping.
Follow us online: Twitter - https://www.twitter.com/friendzonepod Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/thefriendzonepodcast
Have a GREAT day!

item.title: The Vow
item.itunes:author: Loud Speakers Network
item.itunes:summary:
This week on #TheFriendZone, we discuss the HBO 9-part documentary series, “The Vow” - about the NXIVM sex cult. What are the personality traits that make certain people more susceptible to cults? What makes someone a follower? And someone a leader? We share our thoughts and personal experiences.
Thank you to our Sponsors: FightCamp - If you’re looking for a workout that keeps you engaged, learning, excited, and motivate — a workout that’s never boring — you’ve got to check out Fight Camp! They provide all the gear and top trainers — it’s everything you need for great workouts. FightCamp brings the boxing gym to you, with a mix of cardio and conditioning for a full-body workout. You get to learn from six highly qualified trainers ranging from a pro MMA fighter and mother of two to a kickboxing world champion. No problem if you’re new to boxing. Their 12-week starter program teaches you the fundamentals of boxing while you get a great workout every time. And there are 400 different workouts. FightCamp offers flexible financing for as low as 0% APR! And right now as a limited time offer, you can try FightCamp for 30 days with their money-back guarantee, just go to https://joinfightcamp.com/ZONE
Jenny Life - Ladies, listen up! Not only do men have MORE Life Insurance than women, they have TWICE as much coverage. Jenny Life wants to shrink that gap. It doesn’t matter if you are a working mom, single mom, expecting mom, single, or if your kids are four-legged fur-babies. You still need life insurance. You need Jenny Life! Jenny Life makes it FAST and EASY for women to know their families will be taken care of with life insurance that’s uniquely built for your needs. With Jenny Life, you can get your Life Insurance Policy without bloodwork or unnecessary red tape - and you can do it all online...from your own home. They ask 5 simple questions, curate plans from dozens of A-rated insurance carriers, and give you a personalized, budget-friendly Life Insurance quote in seconds. For example, a healthy 32 year old woman can get a HALF MILLION DOLLARS in coverage for about a $1 a day, without ever stepping into a doctor’s office! Life Insurance is something every woman should have in place. Because every family deserves a secure financial future. Visit https://jennylife.com/friendzone to get a FREE quote right now! Seedlip - Seedlip founder, Ben Branson, aimed to solve the dilemma of what to drink when you’re not drinking. Drawing inspiration from a centuries-old book entitled The Art of Distillation, Ben tinkered in his kitchen with homegrown herbs and a copper still. The ultimate result was a range of uniquely flavored non-alcoholic spirits without alcohol, calories or sugar. Conveniently delivered direct to your door. Topped with a splash of Ginger Ale or Tonic, Seedlip makes crafting adult, non-alcoholic cocktails easy at home. Made from the finest globally sourced botanical ingredients, Seedlip comes in three varieties: The aromatic Spice 94, herbal Garden 108, and the citrus-forward Grove 42. All without alcohol, calories or sugar. As simple as adding a splash of premium mixer or 2 oz. of your preferred expression or challenging your bartending skills to create a more elevated serve. Seedlip enables you to have that evening drink – any night of the week. Delivered direct to your door via https://seedlipdrinks.com. And for a limited time, get 15% off your order by using the code FriendZone15 at checkout.
Follow us online: Twitter - https://www.twitter.com/friendzonepod Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/thefriendzonepodcast
Have a GREAT day!

If you decide it’s not for you, you can return any non-personalized item for a full refund during that period—no ifs, ands, or asterisks. AND Away offers free shipping & returns on any order within the contiguous U.S., Europe, Canada, and Australia. Start your 100-day trial and shop the entire Away lineup of travel essentials, including their bestselling suitcases at https://www.awaytravel.com/friendzone20

item.title: 4 Da 304's
item.itunes:author: Loud Speakers Network
item.itunes:summary:
This week on #TheFriendZone, it’s the Dustin Ross takeover! We discuss open relationships and marriages.
Black Business of the Week - Mandii B’s new women’s health subscription service https://www.officialboxowner.com
Wellness Segment: Acure Clarifying Shampoo https://acure.com/curiously-clarifying-shampoo.html
Rizos Curls - https://rizoscurls.com
Curl Mix - https://www.curlmix.com
Thank you to our Sponsors: NHTSA - Distracted driving is a serious problem on our roadways leading to the deaths of thousands of people and injuries in the hundreds of thousands each year. When you take your eyes and your focus off the road, even for a second, it can be deadly. Not just for you but for other drivers, pedestrians and bicyclists. Sadly, many Americans use their cell phones while driving. Whether it’s texting, checking emails, scrolling media feeds or any other form of distraction, drivers are putting themselves and others around them at great risk. It’s important to know that 48 states ban texting and driving. Also, 21 states prohibit all drivers from using cell phones while driving. Distracted drivers are not only putting people at risk; they’re also breaking the law. Remember U Drive. U Text. U Pay. Brought to you by NHTSA [NITS-uh]
Tushy - The Hello Tushy modern bidet attachment cleans your butt with a precise stream of fresh water for just SEVENTY-NINE DOLLARS. It attaches to your existing toilet - requires NO electricity or additional plumbing - and cuts toilet paper use by EIGHTY PERCENT - so the Hello Tushy bidet pays for itself in a few months. Because, with Hello Tushy, you don’t wipe at all. Ditch paper products and uncomfortable chafing when you switch to the soothing, cleansing stream of water from a Hello Tushy bidet attachment. AND every Hello Tushy bidet attachment comes with a SIXTY DAY RISK-FREE GUARANTEE and a TWELVE-MONTH WARRANTY. Go to https://hellotushy.com/FRIENDZONE to get 10% off.
Talkspace - Talkspace online therapy lets you connect with a licensed therapist for a fraction of the price of in-person therapy. Match with your perfect therapist from the comfort of your device and reach out 24/7, whenever something is on your mind. The Talkspace network is composed of thousands of licensed therapists who have experience in over forty specialties. The bottom line is that we all need someone to talk to. Talkspace wants to give us the support we deserve at a price we can afford. As a listener of this podcast, you get one-hundred dollars off your first month on Talkspace. To match with your perfect therapist, go to https://www.talkspace.com or download the app. Make sure to use the code ZONE to get one-hundred dollars off your first month and show your support for the show.
Fight Camp - If you’re looking for a workout that keeps you engaged, learning, excited, and motivated — a workout that’s never boring — you’ve got to check out Fight Camp! FightCamp brings the boxing gym to your living room. They provide all the gear and top trainers. You get to learn from six highly qualified trainers ranging from a pro MMA fighter and mother of two to a kickboxing world champion. No problem if you’re new to boxing. Their 12-week starter program teaches you the fundamentals of boxing while you get a great workout every time. And there are 400 different workouts — it’s even great for kids. FightCamp offers flexible financing for as low as 0% APR! And right now as a limited time offer, you can try FightCamp for 30 days with their money-back guarantee, just go to https://joinfightcamp.com/ZONE.
Follow us online: Twitter - https://www.twitter.com/friendzonepod Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/thefriendzonepodcast
Have a GREAT day!

item.title: Queen of the Northeast
item.itunes:author: Loud Speakers Network
item.itunes:summary:
This week on #TheFriendZone, it’s a shoot the shit episode. No hot button. No segment. In other words, brace yourself.
15% discount off The Skin Deep Card Game: http://theskindeep.refr.cc/francheskamedina
Thank you to our Sponsors: Sanvello - Taking care of your mental health shouldn’t be stressful. And with Sanvello, it isn’t. Sanvello has everything you need to feel better, all in one place, including tele-therapy, coaching, self-care tools, and a community that gets it. Get free access to Sanvello Premium and coaching for two weeks by visiting https://www.sanvello.com and get the support you deserve on your mental health journey.
Billie - Meet Billie. They’ve recreated everyday essentials by delivering premium razors and high-performing body care directly to you. No pink tax. No visit to the drugstore. No breaking the bank. Go to My Billie dot com to get their Starter Kit for just $9 - that includes their award-winning razor, two refill blades, and a magnetic holder that keeps your razor safe and dry in between uses. Go to https://mybillie.com/friendzone
Seedlip - Seedlip, the original distilled non-alcoholic spirits. Crafted from the finest globally sourced botanical ingredients, Seedlip comes in three varieties. The aromatic Spice 94, herbal Garden 108, and citrus-forward Grove 42. All without alcohol, calories or sugar. Curiously complex flavors make crafting elevated non-alcoholic cocktails easy at home. As simple as adding a splash of premium mixer or 2 oz. of your preferred expression or challenging your bartending skills to create a more elevated serve, Seedlip enables you to have that evening drink – any night of the week. Simply top Seedlip with a splash of your preferred premium mixer, like Ginger Ale, or use as the base for non-alcoholic cocktails. Delivered direct to your door via https://seedlipdrinks.com/uk
MacMillan’s Driving The Green Book - For nearly 30 years, the Negro Motorist Green Book helped Black Americans travel safely and with dignity during segregation. In the new podcast, 'Driving the Green Book', from Macmillan Podcasts, broadcaster Alvin Hall and activist Janée (Jan-A) Woods Weber take you on a road trip from Detroit to New Orleans, collecting stories from those who used the guide to survive on the road. Together they explore how much has changed for Black people traveling across America today. You’ll hear heartbreaking stories of the dangers Black Americans faced just to visit family or travel to a new city. But you'll also hear inspiring tales of communities who came together to protect each other and fight for a better life. Listen to Driving the Green Book now on Apple Podcasts or wherever you get your podcasts.
Brooklinen - Brooklinen was founded in early 2014 by husband and wife duo Rich and Vicki Fulop. They wanted to find beautiful home essentials that didn't cost an arm and a leg. Today, Brooklinen has moved beyond the bedroom to also offer bathroom and life essentials. You can find super plush towels, shower curtains, bathmats, robes and candles to add that extra lavish touch. There is even ultra-soft loungewear making you feel like you never left your bed. Get 10% off your first order and free shipping when you use promo code FRIENDZONE only at https://www.brooklinen.com
Follow us online: Twitter - https://www.twitter.com/friendzonepod Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/thefriendzonepodcast
Have a GREAT day!

item.title: Break The Ice
item.itunes:author: Loud Speakers Network
item.itunes:summary:
On this week’s episode of #TheFriendZone, it’s the Assante Smith takeover. Remember when we would have random ass ice breakers during the show? They’re back - as a Hot Button segment.
Black Business of the Week - https://parisbeautysupplyz.com
Wellness Segment - The Skin Deep https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCMseH1ZPtQQu-u7EB4ehyyw
Thank you to our Sponsors: Hulu’s Woke - Because “keeping it light” isn’t working. Hulu presents Woke, a new comedy series, Inspired by the life and work of artist Keith Knight. Watch as Woke takes an absurdly irreverent look at identity and culture as it follows Keef, an African American cartoonist finally on the verge of mainstream success when an unexpected incident changes everything! Starring Lamorne Morris, Blake Anderson, T-Murph, Rose McIver and Sasheer Zamata. Woke, All episodes Now Streaming exclusively on Hulu. Visithttps://www.hulu.com/series/woke for more.
Sanvello - Taking care of your mental health shouldn’t be stressful. And with Sanvello, it isn’t. Sanvello has everything you need to feel better, all in one place, including tele-therapy, coaching, self-care tools, and a community that gets it. Get free access to Sanvello Premium and coaching for two weeks by visiting https://www.sanvello.com/friendzone and get the support you deserve on your mental health journey. Sanvello. A place to feel better.
Belif - belif is a K-beauty skincare brand that combines herbal ingredients with Korean skincare science to create an effective and hydrating collection of skincare products. They’re the undisputed authority in hydration and their moisturizer is a staple in any skincare routine. belif’s best-selling moisturizer, Aqua bomb, is a cult-favorite lightweight gel-cream that provides a burst of hydration to skin for a healthy glow. Aqua bomb absorbs quickly into skin making it perfect to prep and prime skin before makeup. Use it in the morning and evening and watch your skin glow. Aqua bomb is available online and in-store at Sephora and Ulta Beauty.
Native - Native is made with ingredients you’ve actually heard of like coconut oil, shea butter, and tapioca starch; they never use things like aluminum, parabens, sulfates or talc. Native just released Plastic Free Deodorant made from 100% paperboard and shipped in a plastic-free bag! Switching to an aluminum-free deodorant doesn’t mean you have to sacrifice on odor protection. Native comes in over ten scents, like Coconut and Vanilla, and Lavender and Rose, PLUS rotating seasonals like the Pumpkin Spice Latte collection! Native is risk-free to try, with free shipping within the US and free 30 day returns and exchanges. Do what I did, and make the switch to Native today by going to https://www.nativedeo.com/friendzone or use promo code FRIENDZONE at checkout, and get 20% off your first order.
Shipstation - If you’re an e-commerce seller, are you ready to meet the demands of a record-breaking online shopping season? Be ready with ShipStation. ShipStation helps online sellers get orders out quickly, save money on shipping costs and keep customers happy. No matter where you’re selling – Amazon, Etsy, your own website – ShipStation brings all your orders into one simple interface. ShipStation works with all of the major carriers including USPS, FedEx, UPS and even International. The Friend Zone listeners can try ShipStation FREE for 60 days when you use offer code FRIENDZONE. That’s https://www.shipstation.com, then enter offer code FRIENDZONE.
Tushy - Ditch paper products and uncomfortable chafing when you switch to the soothing, cleansing stream of water from a Hello Tushy bidet attachment. AND every Hello Tushy bidet attachment comes with a SIXTY DAY RISK-FREE GUARANTEE and a TWELVE-MONTH WARRANTY. Go to https://hellotushy.com/FRIENDZONE for 10% off.
Follow us online: Twitter - https://www.twitter.com/friendzonepod Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/thefriendzonepodcast
Have a GREAT day!

item.title: 5 Years of The Friend Zone
item.itunes:author: Loud Speakers Network
item.itunes:summary:
On this week's episode of #TheFriendZone, we look back at 5 years of The Friend Zone Podcast - the business lessons, personal development and the many ways this show has impacted our lives.
Black Business of the Week: Aziza Handcrafted Jewelry https://azizahandcrafted.com
Wellness Segment: Bookclub thread https://twitter.com/HeyFranHey/status/1276325375790985219?s=20
Thank you to our Sponsors: Belif - Belif is a K-beauty skincare brand that uses herbal ingredients and Korean skincare science to create effective and hydrating products. Their best-selling moisturizer, Aqua bomb, is a lightweight gel-cream that provides a cooling burst of hydration to skin for a healthy glow. And it absorbs quickly without leaving a sticky residue. It’s always hydrating, always moisturizing, and always aqua. Belif Aqua bomb is available online and in-store at Sephora and Ulta Beauty.
Hulu's Woke - Because “keeping it light” isn’t working. Hulu presents Woke, a new comedy series, Inspired by the life and work of artist Keith Knight. Watch as Woke takes an absurdly irreverent look at identity and culture as it follows Keef, an African American cartoonist finally on the verge of mainstream success when an unexpected incident changes everything! Starring Lamorne Morris, Blake Anderson, T-Murph, Rose McIver and Sasheer Zamata. Woke, All episodes Now Streaming exclusively on Hulu. Visit Hulu.com/Woke for more. https://www.hulu.com/series/woke
Billie - Go to https://mybillie.com to get their Starter Kit for just $9 - that includes their award-winning razor, two refill blades, and a magnetic holder that keeps your razor safe and dry in between uses. And Billie is out to change more than the way you shave. They just released THREE completely clean must-have products to add to your routine: lip balm, dry shampoo and face wipes. Stock up.
True Botanicals - True Botanicals’ products can be calming during these stressful times, and they’re delivered straight to your door. Filled with natural and organic ingredients, True Botanicals skin and body products give you results without toxins so you can feel good while working from home. Whether you’re looking for an effective anti-aging regime, seeking a sensitive skin safe solution, struggling with acne-prone skin, or anything else, True Botanicals has a natural formulation that will protect and nourish your skin. https://truebotanicals.com/friendzone
Talkspace - The Talkspace network is composed of thousands of licensed therapists experienced in treating depression, anxiety, substance abuse, trauma, and more. Talkspace is secure and private, using the latest encryption technology to keep your information safe. One-hundred dollars off your first month at https://www.talkspace.com, promo code ZONE.
Discover Card Cash Back - Sometimes our food is more than just food – it’s an integral part of our community. So this year, Discover is giving $5 million to support Black-owned restaurants. To places like Post Office Pies in Birmingham, Alabama. Back in the Day Bakery in Savannah, Georgia. And hundreds more Black-owned restaurants in your local community, all across the country. Learn how you can show your support at Discover.com
Follow us online: Twitter - https://www.twitter.com/friendzonepod Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/thefriendzonepodcast
Have a GREAT day!

Hulu's Woke - Because “keeping it light” isn’t working. Hulu presents Woke, a new comedy series, Inspired by the life and work of artist Keith Knight. Watch as Woke takes an absurdly irreverent look at identity and culture as it follows Keef, an African American cartoonist finally on the verge of mainstream success when an unexpected incident changes everything! Starring Lamorne Morris, Blake Anderson, T-Murph, Rose McIver and Sasheer Zamata. Woke, All episodes Now Streaming exclusively on Hulu. Visit Hulu.com/Woke for more. https://www.hulu.com/series/woke
Billie - Go to https://mybillie.com to get their Starter Kit for just $9 - that includes their award-winning razor, two refill blades, and a magnetic holder that keeps your razor safe and dry in between uses. And Billie is out to change more than the way you shave. They just released THREE completely clean must-have products to add to your routine: lip balm, dry shampoo and face wipes. Stock up.
True Botanicals - True Botanicals’ products can be calming during these stressful times, and they’re delivered straight to your door. Filled with natural and organic ingredients, True Botanicals skin and body products give you results without toxins so you can feel good while working from home. Whether you’re looking for an effective anti-aging regime, seeking a sensitive skin safe solution, struggling with acne-prone skin, or anything else, True Botanicals has a natural formulation that will protect and nourish your skin. https://truebotanicals.com/friendzone
Talkspace - The Talkspace network is composed of thousands of licensed therapists experienced in treating depression, anxiety, substance abuse, trauma, and more. Talkspace is secure and private, using the latest encryption technology to keep your information safe. One-hundred dollars off your first month at https://www.talkspace.com, promo code ZONE.
Discover Card Cash Back - Sometimes our food is more than just food – it’s an integral part of our community. So this year, Discover is giving $5 million to support Black-owned restaurants. To places like Post Office Pies in Birmingham, Alabama. Back in the Day Bakery in Savannah, Georgia. And hundreds more Black-owned restaurants in your local community, all across the country. Learn how you can show your support at Discover.com
Follow us online: Twitter - https://www.twitter.com/friendzonepod Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/thefriendzonepodcast
Have a GREAT day!

item.title: Sixty Seven Minutes
item.itunes:author: Loud Speakers Network
item.itunes:summary:
This week on #TheFriendZone, it’s a shoot the shit episode. No hot button. No segments. Just whatever wants to come up. Brace yourselves.
Black Business of the Week - Movies In Your Car https://www.moviesinyourcar.com
Thank you to our Sponsors:
Imani State of Mind - Imani State of Mind is a new podcast that breaks down mental health and wellness in an accessible and approachable way! The show is hosted by Dr. Imani Walker, who’s been practicing as a psychiatrist for over 10 years. And you might know her from the Bravo show Married to Medicine. She equips listeners with the right language and tools to normalize having these open conversations and break down the stigma. It’s so important to remember to take care of ourselves, and we have to keep our minds healthy to keep growing and keep fighting - Imani State of Mind gives us the tools and tips we need to navigate it all. Listen to Imani State of Mind now wherever you get your favorite podcasts.
Ben & Jerry’s - The Ben & Jerry’s Flavor Gurus have taken a big leap this time. Their new Non-dairy flavors are the perfect sweet treats for vegans, vegetarians and everyone in between! Check out the Ben & Jerry’s sunflower butter lineup, and the whole Non-Dairy family at benjerry.com
Brooklinen - Brooklinen has moved beyond the bedroom to also offer bathroom and life essentials. You can find super plush or ultralight towels, shower curtains, bathmats, robes and candles to add that extra lavish touch. Plus - find silk eyemasks, robes, furniture, art and totes - the final little details that make up your big upgrade. Get 10% off your first order and free shipping when you use promo code FRIENDZONE only at https://www.brooklinen.com
Discover Card Cash Back - Sometimes our food is more than just food – it’s an integral part of our community. So this year, Discover is giving $5 million to support hundreds more Black-owned restaurants in your local community, all across the country. Learn how you can show your support at https://www.discover.com
Follow us online:
Twitter - https://www.twitter.com/friendzonepod Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/thefriendzonepodcast
Have a GREAT day!

item.itunes:author: Loud Speakers Network
item.itunes:summary:
On this week’s episode of #TheFriendZone, it’s the Assante Smith takeover. We discuss Cardi + Meg’s WAP and go down memory lane of the most sexually explicit and controversial songs of our time.
Black Business of the Week - The Artist Kit https://www.studiothr333.com/shop/theartistkit
Thank you to our Sponsors:
Discover Card Cash Back - Sometimes, food is more than just food – it’s part of our community. So this year, Discover is giving $5 million to support Black-owned restaurants. To places like Back in the Day Bakery. Post Office Pies. And hundreds more! Learn how you can show your support at https://www.discover.com
Ben & Jerry’s - Check out the Ben & Jerry’s sunflower butter lineup, and the whole Non-Dairy family at https://www.benjerry.com
Talkspace - If you've been waiting months to figure out what your future is going to look like, you're not alone. Between the uncertainty, waiting for answers, and the everyday stressors of work, school, relationships and more - it's a lot to balance. If anything helps reduce stress and anxiety, it's talking things out. Talkspace has thousands of licensed therapists trained in over 40 specialties, including anxiety, depression, relationship issues and more. If you have something specific you want to work on right now, they will find someone right for you. Talkspace is a fraction of the cost of in-person therapy - but with Talkspace, you can send unlimited messages to your therapist and they'll engage with you at least five days a week. To match with your perfect therapist, go to https://www.talkspace.com or download the app. Make sure to use the code ZONE to get $100 off your first month and show your support for the show.
True Botanicals - Given what’s going on in the world, self care is vital. True Botanicals’ products can be calming during these stressful times, and they’re delivered straight to your door. Filled with natural and organic ingredients, True Botanicals skin and body products give you results without toxins so you can feel good while working from home. Every True Botanicals formula is MADE SAFE® certified – so it’s made WITHOUT 5,000+ known toxic ingredients. But unlike most nontoxic products, True Botanicals solutions actually work to REPAIR skin issues. True Botanicals worked with researchers at leading universities including Carnegie Mellon and Cornell to develop potent formulas that work BETTER than leading beauty brands. And in both of their independent clinical studiesTrue Botanicals outperformed Creme de La Mer products. Whether you’re looking for an effective anti-aging regime, seeking a sensitive skin safe solution, struggling with acne-prone skin, or anything else, True Botanicals has a natural formulation that will protect and nourish your skin. You’ve just got to try True Botanicals for yourself. Get FIFTEEN PERCENT OFF your FIRST purchase at https://truebotanicals.com/friendzone
Follow us online: Twitter - https://www.twitter.com/friendzonepod Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/thefriendzonepodcast
Have a GREAT day!

Wellness Segment - Restorative Yoga for Collective Trauma - Yoga by Biola https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sFeTH2eox1o&t=1699s
Thank you to our Sponsors:
US Bank - This episode is brought to you by ‘Real Good,’ a podcast by U.S. Bank. When COVID-19 hit, U.S. Bank rushed to help people in need by identifying problems the virus created, and highlighting the intersectional nature of issues our communities face every day. Listen to the stories of those doing good, and those whose lives have been changed forever by their work every Wednesday, starting July 1st. Subscribe to Real Good wherever you get your podcasts.
Ben & Jerry’s - Ben & Jerry’s has three new Non-Dairy Frozen Desserts made with sunflower butter. The Ben & Jerry’s Flavor Gurus have taken a big leap this time. Their new Non-dairy flavors are the perfect sweet treats for vegans, vegetarians and everyone in between. Check out the Ben & Jerry’s sunflower butter lineup, and the whole Non-Dairy family at https://www.benjerry.com
True Botanicals - Given what’s going on in the world, self care is vital. True Botanicals’ products can be calming during these stressful times, and they’re delivered straight to your door. Filled with natural and organic ingredients, True Botanicals skin and body products give you results without toxins so you can feel good while working from home. Every True Botanicals formula is MADE SAFE® certified – so it’s made WITHOUT 5,000+ known toxic ingredients. But unlike most nontoxic products, True Botanicals solutions actually work to REPAIR skin issues. True Botanicals worked with researchers at leading universities including Carnegie Mellon and Cornell to develop potent formulas that work BETTER than leading beauty brands.- And in both of their independent clinical studiesTrue Botanicals outperformed Creme de La Mer products. Whether you’re looking for an effective anti-aging regime, seeking a sensitive skin safe solution, struggling with acne-prone skin, or anything else, True Botanicals has a natural formulation that will protect and nourish your skin. Get FIFTEEN PERCENT OFF your FIRST purchase at https://truebotanicals.com/friendzone
Talkspace - We all have something we’re working on. It could be a career change, finding a partner, or procrastinating less. The hard part isn’t identifying your goals - It’s taking action. Luckily, Talkspace online therapy can match you with a licensed therapist from the comfort of your phone or computer. Receive support and accountability every day to talk through challenges and stay on track with whatever you’re working toward. One month on Talkspace costs about the same amount as a single in-person therapy session. But with Talkspace, you can send unlimited messages to your therapist and they’ll engage with you at least 5 days a week. And, Talkspace is secure and private, using the latest encryption technology to store client information. The bottom line is that we all need to talk sometimes and Talkspace wants to give more the support we deserve, at a price we can afford. As a listener of this podcast, you can get $100 off your first month on Talkspace. To match with your perfect therapist, go to https://www.talkspace.com or download the app.
Follow us online: Twitter - https://www.twitter.com/friendzonepod Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/thefriendzonepodcast
Have a GREAT day!

item.title: The Covert Overt
item.itunes:author: Loud Speakers Network
item.itunes:summary:
On this week’s episode of #TheFriendZone, we share our experiences with overt, covert and systemic racism. Stories ranging from trying to get apartments in NYC, racist co-workers, bosses and teachers gaslighting us, to traveling to white neighborhoods for groceries.
Black Business of the Week: https://seeinblack.com
Wellness Segment: Bookclub pick for July - The Spirit of Intimacy by Sobonfu Somé
Thank you to our Sponsors:
Ben & Jerry’s - Ben & Jerry’s Flavor Gurus have taken a big leap this time. Their three new Non-dairy flavors are the perfect sweet treats for vegans, vegetarians and everyone in between! Check out the Ben & Jerry’s sunflower butter lineup, and the whole Non-Dairy family at https://www.benjerry.com
US Bank - This episode is brought to you by Real Good by U.S. Bank. When the COVID-19 outbreak hit, people and businesses alike stepped up to provide relief to those in need. US Bank was at the forefront of that effort. They partnered with nonprofits around the country, donating millions to communities fighting to survive. But while Coronavirus created struggles we’ve never seen before, but it also shined a light on problems our communities face every day. Intersectional problems concerning race, wealth, health, education and so much more. To make a better world, to do real good, we need to learn from the experiences of those in the communities we serve and address the concerns underneath the surface. Each episode of the new podcast, Real Good, tells the stories of people that are truly making an impact, and the people whose lives were changed by their efforts. Listen and subscribe to Real Good wherever you get your podcasts.
Follow us online:
Twitter - https://www.twitter.com/friendzonepod Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/thefriendzonepodcast
Have a GREAT day!

item.itunes:summary:
On this week’s episode of #TheFriendZone, it’s a shoot the shit episode. No hot button. No segments. Just whatever comes up. Brace yourselves.
Black Business of the Week - Black Owned Online Plant Shops https://www.instagram.com/p/CBb7SmdFPes
Thank you to our Sponsors:
Ben & Jerry’s - The Ben & Jerry’s Flavor Gurus have taken a big leap this time. Their new Non-dairy flavors are the perfect sweet treats for vegans, vegetarians and everyone in between. Check out the Ben & Jerry’s sunflower butter lineup, and the whole Non-Dairy family at benjerry.com.
Daily Harvest - Now more than ever, it’s important to eat right. And Daily Harvest makes it easy. They’ll keep your house fully stocked with clean food built on whole fruits and vegetables. Daily Harvest delivers delicious, clean food right to your door. Everything stays fresh in your freezer until you’re ready to enjoy it and takes just a few minutes to prepare. You don’t have to overthink any of your meals for the week because they have delicious options for any time of day: smoothies, soups, harvest bowls, flatbreads, and more! Daily Harvest never uses preservatives, added sugar, or artificial ingredients. They work directly with farms and they freeze organic fruits and vegetables at peak ripeness to lock in nutrients and taste. Daily Harvest is also committed to minimizing their environmental impact. They’re in the process of transitioning to 100% compostable, recyclable packaging and are over 50% of the way there already Go to https://www.daily-harvest.com and enter promo code FRIENDZONE to get twenty-five dollars off your first box!

item.title: Ol' Boy From Amistad
item.itunes:author: Loud Speakers Network
item.itunes:summary:
On this week’s episode of #TheFriendZone, it’s the Assante Smith takeover. We discuss the pros and cons of being social media entrepreneurs and general everyday users. As well as some new “data integrity” policies that may change the way we use the internet forever.
Watch The Friend Zone Live on IGTV - https://www.instagram.com/tv/CBRvuT5gwIU
Black Business of the Week - https://www.theokraproject.com
Wellness Segment - (All Natural) Creamy Squeeze Tube Deodorant https://lonedeodorant.com
Thank you to our Sponsors:
Ben & Jerry’s - Check out the Ben & Jerry’s sunflower butter lineup, and the whole Non-Dairy family at https://www.benjerry.com
Talkspace - I think all of us are dealing with stress right now, whether it’s the isolation, canceled summer plans or economic stress. We all have something on our minds, and it’s important to talk it out. Talking helps, plain and simple. Talkspace online therapy helps you do just that. Match with a licensed therapist from the comfort of your home and get the support you need on your own schedule. Talk to your therapist 24/7 from your computer or phone and hear back daily. One month on Talkspace costs about the same amount as a single in-person therapy session. But with Talkspace you can send unlimited messages to your therapist and they’ll engage with you at least five days a week. Talkspace therapists have experience treating depression, anxiety, substance abuse, and much more. It’s secure and private using the latest encryption technology to store client info. Use promo code ZONE to get $100 off your first month and help support the show. That’s https://www.talkspace.com promo code ZONE.
Okay, Now Listen - Support for The Friend Zone comes from Okay, Now Listen, a new podcast from Netflix and Strong Black Lead – hosted by real-life friends and culture Queens, Sylvia Obell and Scottie Beam. Each episode drops bi-weekly and is a dose of what’s on their minds, what they’re binging, and what’s been blowing up the timeline. These queens cover everything from seeing your ex be a better partner to someone else, to handling grief and trauma during quarantine. They also have the best Netflix recommendations – from Peaky Blinders, to All-American, this duo has you covered. And every once and a while you’ll get the chance to listen to some exclusive celebrity interviews. New episodes drop every other Thursday anywhere you can get podcasts, so what are you waiting for? Subscribe now on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Pocketcasts or wherever else you listen to podcasts. And while you’re at it, follow @strongblacklead on social to stay up-to-date and find out more
Honey - We all shop online. Feel free to share personal stories of how often you shop online and why you love it. And we've all seen that promo code field taunt us at checkout. But thanks to Honey, manually searching for coupon codes is a thing of the past. Honey is the FREE browser extension that finds promo codes for you and automatically applies them to your cart. Imagine you're shopping on one of your favorite sites. When you checkout, the Honey button drops down and all you have to do is click “Apply Coupons.” Wait a few seconds as Honey scans its database of all the working coupons for that site and watch the prices drop!Honey has found its over 17 million members over 2 billion dollars in savings. Honey supports over 30,000 stores online, including Walmart, DoorDash and Lulu Lemon. Get Honey for FREE at https://www.joinhoney.com/FRIENDZONE
Follow us online:
Twitter - https://www.twitter.com/friendzonepod Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/thefriendzonepodcast
Have a GREAT day!

item.title: Keep It 2 Virgils
item.itunes:author: Loud Speakers Network
item.itunes:summary:
This week on #TheFriendZone, we share our thoughts on looting vs peaceful protesting, police strategically placing bricks and hammers around the city, influencers doing it for the gram and more.
Wellness Segment - Community Resources:
Mental Health Professionals working Pro Bono https://twitter.com/ajscribes/status/1267142268571410433?s=20
Lawyers Assisting Arrested Protestors Pro Bono https://twitter.com/riyakatariax/status/1266856139536207872?s=20

item.itunes:summary:
On this week’s episode of #TheFriendZone, it’s a shoot the sh*t episode. No segments. No hot button issue. Just whatever comes up as we go.
Black Business of the Week - Resume Builder GrammarGoddessNYC@gmail.com
Thank you to our Sponsors:
Ben & Jerry’s - Ben & Jerry’s three new Non-Dairy Frozen Desserts are a new twist on vegan euphoria. So many Non-Dairy flavors, so little time. Ben & Jerry’s has three new Non-Dairy Frozen Desserts made with sunflower butter. The Ben & Jerry’s Flavor Gurus have taken a big leap this time. Their new Non-dairy flavors are the perfect sweet treats for vegans, vegetarians and everyone in between! Check out the Ben & Jerry’s sunflower butter lineup, and the whole Non-Dairy family at https://www.benjerry.com
WHOOP - WHOOP is a fitness wearable that provides personalized insights on the performance of your sleep, how recovered your body is, and how much stress and exertion you put on your body throughout the day. Every day when you get up, you get a recovery score based on your HRV, resting heart rate, and sleep performance that can be used as an indicator to how to approach your day. And the app has built in features like the Strain Coach, which gives you target exertion goals to workout optimally for the level of intensity your body is signaling it can handle. Based on how strenuous your day is, the app also has a built in Sleep Coach, which lets you know how much sleep you should be getting — based on your OWN performance goals. Go to WHOOP https://www.whoop.com and enter FRIENDZONE at checkout to save 15%
Daily Harvest - Now more than ever, it’s important to eat right. And Daily Harvest makes it easy. They’ll keep your house fully stocked with clean food built on whole fruits and vegetables. Daily Harvest delivers delicious, clean food right to your door. Everything stays fresh in your freezer until you’re ready to enjoy it and takes just a few minutes to prepare. You don’t have to overthink any of your meals for the week because they have delicious options for any time of day: smoothies, soups, harvest bowls, flatbreads, and more! Daily Harvest never uses preservatives, added sugar, or artificial ingredients. They work directly with farms and they freeze organic fruits and vegetables at peak ripeness to lock in nutrients and taste. Daily Harvest is also committed to minimizing their environmental impact. They’re in the process of transitioning to 100% compostable, recyclable packaging and are over 50% of the way there already. Go to https://www.daily-harvest.com and enter promo code FRIENDZONE to get twenty-five dollars off your first box.
Follow us online:
Twitter - https://www.twitter.com/friendzonepod
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/thefriendzonepodcast
Have a GREAT day!

Talkspace - Being home so much, especially during a crisis, can be a breeding ground for anxiety. You may feel lonely but you're not alone - we're all adjusting to this new normal. For Mental Health Awareness Month, Talkspace therapy is more committed than ever to expanding access to support for anyone who is struggling. With Talkspace, you get matched with a licensed therapist - based on your needs and preferences - from the safety of your home. Send your therapist texts, audio, picture or video messages from your phone or computer 24/7. Everything happens within Talkspace’s secure platform, all on your schedule Talkspace has thousands of licensed therapists trained in over 40 specialties including anxiety, depression and relationship issues. Once matched, you can begin therapy the same day. The bottom line? You deserve support and don't have to struggle on your own. Your Talkspace therapist can be your dedicated support system, there to help you feel healthier and more empowered, even in these uncertain circumstances. As a listener of this podcast, you can get $100 off your first month on Talkspace. Make sure to use the code ZONE to get $100 off your first month and show your support for the show. That’s ZONE and https://www.talkspace.com

item.title: Toosie Slide Out The UFO
item.itunes:author: Loud Speakers Network
item.itunes:summary:
On this week’s episode of #TheFriendZone, there’s no hot button. No segments. We freestyle and talk about whatever comes up. Aliens, Robot popstars, the Mars project, and more funny randomness.
Black Business of the Week - The XD Experience on YouTube https://www.youtube.com/thexdexperience
Thank you to our Sponsors: Door Dash - Delivery is more than just pizza in 2020. With a selection of your favorite flavors from across the globe, you can order world cuisine from the comfort of your living room with DoorDash. DoorDash brings all of America’s flavors to your door. Ordering is easy. Open the DoorDash app, choose what you want to eat, and your food will be delivered to you, wherever you are. Not only is your favorite pizza joint already on DoorDash, but there are over 310,000 restaurant partners in 4,000 cities, so you might find a new favorite, too. With door-to-door delivery in all 50 US states, Puerto Rico, Canada, and Australia, you can order from your local go-to’s or choose from your favorite national restaurants like Chipotle, Wendy’s, Chick-Fil-A, and The Cheesecake Factory. With DoorDash, you’ll never have to worry about your next meal. Right now, our listeners can get $5 off their first order of $15 or more when you download the DoorDash app and enter promo code ZONE.
StoryWorth - Finding the perfect present for mom is tough, especially if you don’t have the luxury of celebrating Mother’s Day together in person. But you can gift your mom the chance to connect with loved-ones through StoryWorth. StoryWorth is an online service that helps your loved-ones share stories through thought-provoking questions about their memories and personal thoughts. It’s a fun and meaningful way to engage with family, especially with relatives you might not see often. Every week StoryWorth emails your family member different prompts – questions you’ve never thought to ask like, “What have been some of your life’s greatest surprises?”. Reading the weekly stories is fun and makes your family feel close even if you’re not together. After one year, StoryWorth will compile the answers and photos into a beautiful keepsake book that’s shipped for free. It’s something your family will treasure forever. Give your mom the most meaningful gift this year with StoryWorth. Get started right away without the need for shipping by going to https://storyworth.com/friendzone. You’ll get $10 off your first purchase!

item.description:
On this week’s episode of #TheFriendZone, there’s no hot button. No segments. We freestyle and talk about whatever comes up. Aliens, Robot popstars, the Mars project, and more funny randomness.
Black Business of the Week - The XD Experience on YouTube https://www.youtube.com/thexdexperience
Thank you to our Sponsors: Door Dash - Delivery is more than just pizza in 2020. With a selection of your favorite flavors from across the globe, you can order world cuisine from the comfort of your living room with DoorDash. DoorDash brings all of America’s flavors to your door. Ordering is easy. Open the DoorDash app, choose what you want to eat, and your food will be delivered to you, wherever you are. Not only is your favorite pizza joint already on DoorDash, but there are over 310,000 restaurant partners in 4,000 cities, so you might find a new favorite, too. With door-to-door delivery in all 50 US states, Puerto Rico, Canada, and Australia, you can order from your local go-to’s or choose from your favorite national restaurants like Chipotle, Wendy’s, Chick-Fil-A, and The Cheesecake Factory. With DoorDash, you’ll never have to worry about your next meal. Right now, our listeners can get $5 off their first order of $15 or more when you download the DoorDash app and enter promo code ZONE.
StoryWorth - Finding the perfect present for mom is tough, especially if you don’t have the luxury of celebrating Mother’s Day together in person. But you can gift your mom the chance to connect with loved-ones through StoryWorth. StoryWorth is an online service that helps your loved-ones share stories through thought-provoking questions about their memories and personal thoughts. It’s a fun and meaningful way to engage with family, especially with relatives you might not see often. Every week StoryWorth emails your family member different prompts – questions you’ve never thought to ask like, “What have been some of your life’s greatest surprises?”. Reading the weekly stories is fun and makes your family feel close even if you’re not together. After one year, StoryWorth will compile the answers and photos into a beautiful keepsake book that’s shipped for free. It’s something your family will treasure forever. Give your mom the most meaningful gift this year with StoryWorth. Get started right away without the need for shipping by going to https://storyworth.com/friendzone. You’ll get $10 off your first purchase!
Daily Harvest - Daily Harvest delivers delicious, clean food right to your door – making it easy to stock up and eat healthy. They have amazing options for any time of day, like smoothies, soups, harvest bowls, flatbreads, and more! Go to https://get.daily-harvest.com and enter promo code FRIENDZONE to get twenty-five dollars off your first box!
Follow us online: Twitter - https://www.twitter.com/friendzonepod Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/thefriendzonepodcast
Have a GREAT day!

item.itunes:author: Loud Speakers Network
item.itunes:summary:
On this week’s episode of #TheFriendZone, it’s the Assante Smith takeover. Still thawing out from 4/20 festivities, brace yourselves trying to follow along.
Black Business of the Week - Career Coaching Resource https://doublemcoaching.com
Wellness Segment - Free mental health resources: Liberate - Meditation app for POC https://liberatemeditation.com
Headspace - Guided meditations, breathing and sleep tools https://www.headspace.com
Insight Timer - Archive of meditations and sounds https://insighttimer.com
Notes from the Universe - https://www.tut.com/account/quicksignup
Thank you to our Sponsors: Daily Harvest - Now more than ever, it’s important to eat right. And Daily Harvest makes it easy. They’ll keep your house fully stocked with clean food built on whole fruits and vegetables. Daily Harvest delivers delicious, clean food right to your door. Everything stays fresh in your freezer until you’re ready to enjoy it and takes just a few minutes to prepare. You don’t have to overthink any of your meals for the week because they have delicious options for any time of day: smoothies, soups, harvest bowls, flatbreads, and more! Daily Harvest never uses preservatives, added sugar, or artificial ingredients. They work directly with farms and they freeze organic fruits and vegetables at peak ripeness to lock in nutrients and taste. Go to https://www.daily-harvest.com and enter promo code FRIENDZONE to get twenty-five dollars off your first box!
Talkspace - We all have something we want to change about ourselves, whether it’s spending too much time on social media or wanting to start a new hobby – but taking action can feel impossible without the right support. Talkspace online therapy is the most convenient and affordable way to make lasting change in your life with the support of a licensed therapist. Talkspace matches you with a licensed therapist based on your needs and preferences, with thousands of licensed therapists trained in over 40 specialties available. Send your licensed therapist texts, audio, picture or video messages from your phone or computer whenever you need to. No need to make appointments. Everything happens within Talkspace’s secure platform, all on your schedule. Therapy is a great tool for developing coping skills, dealing with stress, and getting the accountability you need to achieve your goals. To match with your perfect therapist, go to https://www.talkspace.com or download the app. Make sure to use the code ZONE to get $100 off your first month and show your support for the show.
Follow us online: Twitter - https://www.twitter.com/friendzonepod
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/thefriendzonepodcast
Have a GREAT day!

item.title: Nothing Was The Same
item.itunes:author: Loud Speakers Network
item.itunes:summary:
On this week’s episode of #TheFriendZone, we step into the Twilight Zone. In Psychology, a false memory refers to cases in which people remember events differently from the way they happened or remember events that never happened at all. But what does it mean when a large group of people collectively misremember an event or experience? We scan some of our (collective) childhood memories in search of the real and imagined.

Bevel - This episode is brought to you by Bevel, a head-to-toe personal care brand built for Black Men. We’d like to introduce you to the Bevel Deodorant; an aluminum free deodorant that goes on clear with no lines, streaks or clumps and stays strong to fight against odor for up to 48 hours. And the Bevel Bar Soap; a sulfate-free exfoliating bar soap that’s dermatologist tested and infused with Shea and cocoa butter. Lastly; meet the Bevel Body Wash; made with the freshest ingredients, like Argan Oil, Charcoal and Jojoba Esters, to exfoliate, nourish and renew sensitive skin. So stop what you’re doing and check out this new line of Bevel products today at https://getbevel.com And don’t forget to check out Bevel’s sister brand FORM Beauty. Available at sephora.com and formbeauty.com

item.itunes:summary:
On this week’s episode of #TheFriendZone, it’s the Assante takeover! In honor of the passing of James Lipton, we answer “Inside The Actors Studio” style interview questions.
Black Business of the Week: Imani Miller’s Ghanaian Wax Print Face Masks https://www.instagram.com/p/B-GHXeWJJIU/?igshid=fs6z4mj9ln80
Thank you to our Sponsors:
LOLA - Introducing LOLA, a female-founded company offering a line of organic cotton tampons, pads, liners and biodegradable, all-natural cleansing wipes. LOLA products come in a simple, customizable and flexible subscription – delivering exactly what you need when you need it. You can even tailor your subscription based on product type, absorbency, quantity and frequency. For 30% off your first month’s subscription, visit https://www.mylola.com and enter FRIENDZONE30 when you subscribe!
True Botanicals - Filled with natural and organic ingredients, True Botanicals skin and body products deliver results without toxins. True Botanicals combines the latest scientific advances and centuries-old botanical extracts to create all-natural formulas in their products; like their Hydrating Face Cleanser, Face Oil for Aging Skin, and Nutrient Face Mist. Every True Botanicals formula is MADE SAFE® certified – meaning made WITHOUT 5,000+ known toxic ingredients. And it actually works to repair skin issues! Researchers at leading universities worked with True Botanicals to identify nourishing botanical extracts rich in antioxidants, vitamins, and essential fatty acids to develop potent formulas that work BETTER than leading beauty brands. Whether you’re looking for an effective anti-aging regime, managing sensitive skin, pregnancy hormones, or acne-prone skin, True Botanicals has a natural formulation that will protect and nourish your skin. You’ve just got to try True Botanicals for yourself. Get 15% of your FIRST purchase at https://truebotanicals.com/friendzone
Talkspace - Talkspace matches you with a licensed therapist based on your needs and preferences, with thousands of licensed therapists trained in over 40 specialties available. Send your licensed therapist texts, audio, picture or video messages from your phone or computer whenever you need to. No need to make appointments. Everything happens within Talkspace’s secure platform, all on your schedule. The bottom line is that life can be hard, and Talkspace wants to give more of us the support we need, at a price we can afford. As a listener of this podcast, you can get $100 off your first month on Talkspace. Go to https://www.talkspace.com or download the app. Make sure to use the code ZONE to get $100 off your first month and show your support for the show.

It’s also hypoallergenic and anti-microbial. Their Organic CleanBamboo is extremely breathable and regulates your temperature to improve your quality of sleep. So why not try Ettitude? These amazing sheets have a 30-day risk-free trial. If you’re not fully satisfied, you can return your sheets for a full refund – they even cover shipping on returns! The ONLY way to get 20 percent off your set of Ettitude sheets (and FREE shipping) is to text ZONE to 64-000!
Follow us online: Twitter - https://www.twitter.com/friendzonepod Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/thefriendzonepodcast
Have a GREAT day!

item.title: The 30-Year-Old Secret
item.itunes:author: Loud Speakers Network
item.itunes:summary:
On this week’s episode of #TheFriendZone, we stepped back into The Crime Zone. We found an eerie story on a Reddit “confessions” thread about a family, their sociopathic baby and a haunting secret.
Black Business of the Week - Jeff Jenkins https://www.chubbydiaries.com
Thank you to our Sponsors: Native - Many conventional deodorants contain aluminum, which forms a plug in your sweat glands to keep you from sweating. But Native’s deodorant is made without aluminum, so you can feel better about what you’re putting on your body while smelling and feeling fresh all day long. Native deodorant is formulated without aluminum, parabens, or talc, and made with ingredients you’ve actually heard of, like coconut oil and shea butter. It comes in over 10 scents like Coconut & Vanilla and Lavender & Rose. For 20% off your first purchase, visit https://www.nativedeodorant.com and use promo code friendzone during checkout.
BET’s Boomerang - BET owns Wednesday nights with two shows from Emmy® winning writer and executive producer Lena Waithe (WAY-TH). March 11 at 10:30/9:30 central: catch the return of Boomerang. This season, Simone and Bryson aren’t what they used to be…and neither are their friends. Find out what drama returns to haunt the crew—and where loyalties lie…somewhere between their feelings--and the facts. Will losing at love be sacrificed for winning at life? Boomerang hits after an all new Twenties at 10. Twenties is the bold comedy everyone is buzzing about. Hailed by Deadline as a show that “redefines the Black Queer narrative”, Twenties follows three friends—one queer and two straight--navigating life, love and working in Hollywood. BET delivers two great ways to spend your Wednesday nights. Catch the season premiere of Boomerang Wednesday, March 11th at 10:30/9:30 central right after an all new Twenties-only on BET. For all things Boomerang and Twenties, visit https://www.BET.com.
Handy - With Handy, there’s a better way to knock out your spring cleaning this year. Handy is the easy and convenient way to book home cleanings on a schedule that works for you. Book a home cleaning in just 60-seconds, and Handy will match you with a top-rated Pro in your area. Choose a weekly, biweekly, or monthly plan; Handy schedules your recurring bookings for you. With Handy’s upfront pricing, what you see is what you pay, and you can pay and tip securely on the app. Handy’s Pros are background checked and rated by customers to ensure quality. Learn more about Handy’s background checks at Handy.com/trust-and-safety. If you're not satisfied with the service, they’ll make it right at no extra charge. For our listeners, Handy has a special limited time offer. Get your first 3-hour cleaning for ONLY $29 when you sign up for a cleaning plan. Go to https://www.handy.com/friendzone and enter promo code FRIENDZONE.
Follow us online: Twitter - https://www.twitter.com/friendzonepod Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/thefriendzonepodcast
Have a GREAT day!

This year Bevel is introducing a new lineup of products built for your skin, and your hair. We’d like to introduce you to the Bevel Deodorant; an aluminum free deodorant that goes on clear with no lines, streaks or clumps and stays strong to fight against odor for up to 48 hours. The Bevel Bar Soap; a sulfate-free exfoliating bar soap that’s dermatologist tested and infused with Shea and cocoa butter. Lastly; meet the Bevel Body Wash; made with the freshest ingredients, like Argan Oil, Charcoal and Jojoba Esters, to exfoliate, nourish and renew sensitive skin. So stop what you’re doing and check out this new line of Bevel products today at https://getbevel.com And don’t forget to check out Bevel’s sister brand FORM Beauty. Available at https://www.sephora.com and https://formbeauty.com

item.title: Radical Transparency
item.itunes:author: Loud Speakers Network
item.itunes:summary:
On this week’s episode of #TheFriendZone, Dustin brings up Carlton + Diamond from #LoveIsBlind Netflix and whether or not radical transparency is necessary in a relationship.
Black Business of the Week:
Wellness Segment: Music to think, chill, read and study to.
Chilled Cow https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCSJ4gkVC6NrvII8umztf0Ow
ChillHop Music https://www.youtube.com/user/Chillhopdotcom
Majestic Casual https://www.youtube.com/user/majesticcasual
Assanté’s “We Belong Here” event with The Huffington Post: https://huffpostwebelonghere.splashthat.com/?ncid=tweetlnkushpmg00000051
Thank you to our Sponsors:
NBC’s Good Girls - The new season of NBC’s Good Girls is generating serious buzz. Christina Hendricks, Retta, and Mae Whitman have never been more hilarious as America’s favorite moms-turned-criminals! Seriously, if you’ve missed it – get online and stream it immediately. Critics call Good Girls “audacious” and ‘addictive”. And Rotten Tomatoes rates it one hundred percent fresh. Don’t miss Good Girls – Sundays on NBC, and stream anytime.
Talkspace - When you’re busy, like we all are, the first thing that falls to the bottom of the list tends to be taking care of yourself. People tend to say “I don’t have time or money for that,” but Talkspace online therapy is the most convenient and affordable way to get the support of a licensed therapist. Talkspace matches you with a licensed therapist based on your needs and preferences, with thousands of licensed therapists trained in over 40 specialties available. Send your licensed therapist texts, audio, picture or video messages from your phone or computer whenever you need to. No need to make appointments. Everything happens within Talkspace’s secure platform, all on your schedule. As a listener of this podcast, you can get $100 off your first month on Talkspace, when you use code ZONE. To match with your perfect therapist, go to https://www.talkspace.com or download the app.
Door Dash - DoorDash brings all of America’s flavors to your door. Ordering is easy. Open the DoorDash app, choose what you want to eat, and your food will be delivered to you, wherever you are. Not only is your favorite pizza joint already on DoorDash, but there are over 310,000 restaurant partners in 4,000 cities, so you might find a new favorite, too. With door-to-door delivery in all 50 US states, Puerto Rico, Canada, and Australia, you can order from your local go-to’s or choose from your favorite national restaurants like Chipotle, Wendy’s, Chick-Fil-A, and The Cheesecake Factory. Right now, our listeners can get $5 off their first order of $15 or more when you download the DoorDash app and enter promo code ZONE.
True Botanicals - Life is full of tough choices and trade-offs, but what you put on your body every day shouldn’t be one of them. Filled with natural and organic ingredients, True Botanicals skin and body products deliver results without toxins. True Botanicals combines the latest scientific advances and centuries-old botanical extracts to create all-natural formulas in their products; like their Hydrating Face Cleanser, Face Oil for Aging Skin, and Nutrient Face Mist. Every True Botanicals formula is MADE SAFE® certified – meaning made WITHOUT 5,000+ known toxic ingredients. Researchers at leading universities worked with True Botanicals to identify nourishing botanical extracts rich in antioxidants, vitamins, and essential fatty acids to develop potent formulas that work BETTER than leading beauty brands. Whether you’re looking for an effective anti-aging regime, managing sensitive skin, pregnancy hormones, or acne-prone skin, True Botanicals has a natural formulation that will protect and nourish your skin. You’ve just got to try True Botanicals for yourself. Get FIFTEEN PERCENT OFF your FIRST purchase at https://truebotanicals.com/friendzone
Follow us online:
Twitter - https://www.twitter.com/friendzonepod Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/thefriendzonepodcast
Have a GREAT day!
